amendment.description: To further reinforce the discretion of the Secretary of Homeland Security in applying criteria to designate college- and university-based centers for homeland security research.

vote.text: Amendment SA 74 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 74 proposed by Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S1416-1417; text: CR S1417) To further reinforce the discretion of the Secretary of Homeland Security in applying criteria to designate college- and university-based centers for homeland security research.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 74 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 74 proposed by Senator Stevens.
